description: Regular advisory published with account states
title: io.nats.server.advisory.v1.account_connections

id.description: Unique correlation ID for this event

timestamp.description: The time this event was created in RFC3339 format

server.description: Details about the server the client connected to

name.description: The configured name for the server, matches ID when unconfigured

host.description: The host this server runs on, typically a IP address

id.description: The unique server ID for this node

cluster.description: The cluster the server belongs to

ver.description: The version NATS running on the server

jetstream.description: Indicates if this server has JetStream enabled

time.description: The local time of the server

acc.description: The account the update is for

conns.description: The number of active client connections to the server

leafnodes.description: The number of active leafnode connections to the server

total_conns.description: The combined client and leafnode account connections
